title: Behavior of a function based on its derivative

content.question: The graph of fâ€² the derivative of a function f, is shown above. The domain of f is the open interval 0 < x < d. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: f has a local minimum at x = c .
f has a local maximum at x = b .
The graph of f has a point of inflection at (a, f(a)) .
The graph of f has a point of inflection at (b, f(b)) .
The graph of f is concave up on the open interval (c, d)

content.answer: The graph of f has a point of inflection at (b, f(b)) .

topic.text: 5.9: Connecting a Function, Its First Derivative, and Its Second Derivative

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
